summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the acceptance of the sum of Five Hundred Dollars ($500.00) from George E. Todd, the duly appointed, qualified and acting executor of the last will and testament of Lizzie E. Salisbury, deceased, the execution of a proper voucher acknowledging receipt of said sum, and the drawing of a bill of exchange by the city treasurer to secure the payment of the same, and declaring an emergency.
